og.title: AI Interviewer - Prepare for interviews with an HR AI-powered professional
og.description: Get or create interviews from an AI-powered and unbiased HR-like professional! Prepare for interviews or use it in your business.

twitter.title: AI Interviewer - Prepare for interviews with an AI-powered HR-like professional
twitter.description: Get or create interviews from an AI-powered and unbiased HR-like professional! Prepare for interviews or use it in your business.
twitter.creator: @pulgueta

hero.title: Get or create interviews by an HR AI-powered professional in minutes!
hero.description: Improve your interview skills and get feedback on your answers or use it in your own company to interview candidates

personal.title: Don't lose any opportunities to get your dream job.
personal.description: With AInterviewer, you can practice your skills and get feedback on your performance just like in a real interview. Provide some information about yourself, choose the job you want to practice for, and start the interview.

enterprise.title: Don't waste time with stressful interviews and processes.
enterprise.description: With AInterviewer, you can create an interview based on the job and candidate's profile, choose the questions you want to ask and the time to answer each one. After the interview, you can review the candidate's performance, give feedback and move on with the hiring process.

form.title: Create an account
form.description: Get access to the best interview preparation program.
